products.name: The Special Pantsuit
products.description: This is the coolest pantsuit you've ever seen. Fits like a dream. Wear this everywhere, and nowhere.
products.bulletDescription: So baggy and yet hugs all the right places. Big hidden pockets. Front zipper so you can zip yourself in. Silk material, reinforced stitching

products.name: Bernard Pant
products.description: Full length, wide-leg silhouette, draped halter neck and open back
products.bulletDescription: Hidden side zip closure. Waist tie detail. Ribbed fabric detail throughout

products.name: Olivia Jumpsuit
products.description: Fabric is mid-weight, slinky metallic knit
products.bulletDescription: Hook-and-eye and hidden zip closures at back. Dry clean. Imported, China

products.name: Belle Jumpsuit
products.description: Jacquard fabric, Front button closures, Chest patch pockets
products.bulletDescription: So baggy and yet hugs all the right places. Big hidden pockets. Front zipper so you can zip yourself in. Silk material, reinforced stitching

sizeInfos.small: These are sized a little small. We advise ordering the next size up from what you normally wear.
sizeInfos.big: These are sized a little large. We advise ordering the next size down from what you normally wear.

wearInfos.baggy: These are meant to be warn slightly baggy so that they are comfortable. Zipper front with rolled up sleeves. Hip pockets on the front
wearInfos.tight: These will cover your body nice and tight
